items.title: Water Treatment Plant Simulator
items.blurb: Interactive operator-training simulator for conventional surface water treatment.
items.description: Scenario-based simulator for coagulation, filtration, disinfection, and process upsets.

items.title: SCADA Alarm Normalizer
items.blurb: Standardized alarm text and priority model for faster response.
items.description: Audit and cleanup workflow for high-noise alarm environments with operator-first naming conventions.

items.title: Jar Test Tracker
items.blurb: Repeatable jar-test logging template with dose and settled turbidity trend capture.
items.description: Tracks source shifts and links bench outcomes to actual dose setpoint decisions.

_guide: Each item should include: id, title, blurb, description, tag, status, featured, url. Thumbnail is optional.
